message.body: All I saw was 3OT. Was the rest of the game officiated so badly?
Actually it was pretty good overall. The announcing was horrific, though. Bobby knight needs to retire, like, NOW.
Yeah, he was awful. But I saw at least 3 fouls missed on ###### in the last 30 seconds.
Poor Dan Shulman â€” Bobby Knight in the opener, Dickie V in the nightcap.
Ha ha ha. He should put in for hazard pay
